title: Grand Reopening: Maldives All-Inclusive Private Pool Villas with Free-Flow Cocktails & Seaplane Transfers
description:
Located on the glittering coral reefs of the South Ari Atoll, just a 25-minute seaplane flight from Male, these private pool villas are your gateway to Maldivian beauty. 

Recently rebranded to the internationally renowned NH, this escape invites you to dive into the blue lagoon and discover vibrant dive sites filled with spectacular aquatic animals, all just moments from your villa.

With four restaurants and bars onsite, you can savour all-inclusive dining at Sea Spray restaurant, sip cocktails by the pool and sample the freshest catch at Ocean by Kuda Rah. When it comes time to relax, the spa is on hand for treatments inspired by Balinese wellness practices.
offer_address: Kuda Rah, South Ari Atoll 0000150, Maldives
